text: Sounds interesting! Maybe it could be a side project or just a hobby if you enjoy it and you're good at it? You never know where it could lead :slightly_smiling_face:

Hey Halima! How are you? I'm so sorry I've not got bak to you for so long, I've had a really busy few weeks... how's everything going? And how are you feeling about your Kingston interview tomorrow? Did you rearrange the other one?
Let me know how you're getting on and if there's anything I can help you out with :slightly_smiling_face:
